events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and will begin the review process shortly.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's software development experience and skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the hiring process for this candidate focused on their software engineering background.
The initial phone screening went well, with the candidate demonstrating solid knowledge in modern software development methodologies.
The candidate responded promptly to the interview scheduling request and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity.
The technical interview was scheduled successfully with the engineering team to assess the candidate's coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
